name: Truffle-Infused Artisan Popcorn
description: Elevate your snacking experience with our Truffle-Infused Artisan Popcorn. Handcrafted in small batches, each kernel is lightly air-popped and tossed with a delicate blend of white truffle oil, Himalayan pink salt, and a hint of cracked black pepper. Perfect for gourmet gatherings or a luxurious treat at home, this popcorn is free from artificial flavors and preservatives. Enjoy a sophisticated crunch that lingers with earthy, savory notes and a satisfying finish. Indulge yourself or share with friends—either way, it’s an irresistible upgrade to traditional popcorn.
